pages.text: Copy things onto your clipboard.  Clipboards can be changed with commands.

$(li)$(l)//copy$()$(br) copy the selection, puts in on your clipboard $(br)$(li)$(l)//cut$()$(br) copy, but also deletes the selection $(br)$(li)$(l)//rotate <Y> <X> <Z>$()$(br) Rotates the clipboard $(br)$(li)$(l)//flip$()$(br) mirror your clipboard perpendicular to the direction you look

$(li)$(l)//paste$()$(br) pastes your clipboard $(br)$(li)$(l)//paste -a$()$(br) pastes your clipboard but without air $(br)$(li)$(l)//br clipboard$()$(br) a brush that places your clipboard $(br)$(li)$(l)//br clipboard -a$()$(br) a brush to place clipboard without air
